#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int palindrome(long long int a);
long long int rev(long long int b);
int main()
{
  long long	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		
	long long	int d;
		cin>>d;long long int i=0;
		while(palindrome(d)!=1)
		{
		d=d+rev(d);	
		i++;
		}
	long long	int pal=d;
		
	cout<<i<<' '<<pal<<"\n";	
		
		
		
		
	}
	
	
	
	return 0;
	
	}
	int palindrome(long long int a)
	{
		long long int s=a;long long int sum=0;long long int r;
		while(a)
		{
			r=a%10;
			sum=sum*10+r;
			a=a/10;
		}
		if(sum==s)
		return 1;
		else
		return 0;
		
		
	}
	long long int rev(long long int b)
	{
		
	long long int sum=0;long long int r;
			while(b)
		{
			r=b%10;
			sum=sum*10+r;
			b=b/10;
		}
	return sum;	
		
	}
